Html:
Does anyone encounter the same issue?

ModuleManager.LoadModule(moduleName) is failing if one of the directories in the ModulePath contains #.  I tried to put the full path when setting the ModulePath -- no luck.

Thank you in advance.

Hi,

There is a know issue in Prism where if the path of a module contains a '#' character in it an error occurs. You can find more information about this issue in the following work item:

  • Error when place Modularity sample to directory with # in name

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
